name: Pizza Dash
description: Work solo or with a teammate to make as many pizzas as possible in 45 seconds! Using the arrow keys for Player 1 and the A, W, S, D keys for Player 2 (if applicable), gather ingredients before they disappear. But, beware of the trash cans, which will throw out all the ingredients you have worked so hard to collect. Remember to follow the recipe: each pizza needs one of each topping. Good luck!
